# predict.surf — Surfing & Water Sports Prediction Markets

> Real-time prediction markets for surfing & water sports. Bet on outcomes, see live odds, and win. Free to play with shared pools powered by Firebase.


predict.surf is a prediction market platform focused on surfing & water sports. Users can bet YES or NO on curated markets with real-time shared pools. Features live odds, countdown timers, trending markets, and social sharing. Part of the Predict Network — 18 niche prediction market sites.


## Pages

- [Homepage — Surfing & Water Sports prediction markets with live odds](https://predict.surf)
- [Markets — Active surfing & water sports prediction markets](https://predict.surf#markets)


## Keywords

prediction market, surfing & water sports, betting, odds, forecast, predict.surf
